list_definition.definition: a group of houses, shops, schools etc, that is bigger than a village but smaller than a city

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: I’m going into town to buy a dress
He’s in town doing some shopping.

list_definition.mean_english: cư dân của thị trấn thị xã
list_definition.definition: the people who live in such a group of houses etc

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The whole town turned out to greet the returning soldiers.

list_definition.definition: towns in general as opposed to the countryside

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: Do you live in the country or the town?
